topics.body:
*replying to previous page*
The problem with the .hack anime series is that it had a good idea, but they messed up the execution.  There's parts of the anime where there's entire episodes primarily consisting of talking against a background.

It's kind of a mixed bag anime; on the one hand it's a good idea, on the other hand if you're looking for a action anime you're going to be bored out of your mind.
